name: Garaj: GO
description:
GAME VERSION : v0.0.6 (ALPHA TEST)

3D MULTIPLAYER FPS SHOOTER FUN GAME Discord Nick : Fortem#0001 Discord Game Server : https://discord.gg/NPUPSvPF4X

Good luck && Have Fun! :) Our Public Discord Server : https://discord.gg/vhABFB5Kyz

[New] Login System added.

[New] Account and IP ban systems added. (Only server)

[New**RAMADAN**] Ramadan Bread added to heal you when touch it. (When Ramadan ended, it will be removed)

[New] VSync enabled.

[Removed**RAMADAN**] Health removed until Ramadan ended.

[Updated] Now you must input your nickname while registering game, you can not change your nickname unless changing name with game coin/IAP system added (coming soon). 

[Updated] Settings Panel changed.

[Updated] Player size increased.

[Updated] Minor UI and gameplay changes were done!

[Fixed] Discord message bug fixed when player joined the game.

[Fixed] Recoil system improved.

[Fixed] Health system bug fixed.

[Fixed] Hitboxes improved.

[Fixed] Now you can not draw graffiti if you are so far from wall you aimed.

[Buff] Rocket damage and damage area increased.

[Buff] Server optimizated.

[Buff] Client (your game) optimizated.
